without_risk_factors.adr_name: Injury And Death To The Developing Fetus
without_risk_factors.fda_context: ...continue lisinopril and hydrochlorothiazide tablets as soon as possible. Drugs that act directly on the renin-angiotensin system can cause injury and death to the developing fetus. See Warnings, Fetal Toxicity .
